meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>medicine</kanji> <kanji>dose</kanji> <kanji>expert</kanji> is someone who knows exactly how much dose of each medicine you should be getting. The person who specializes in this is a <vocabulary>pharmacist</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
